argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simplr | |- ( ( ( Fun F /\ ran F C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) /\ x e. dom F ) -> ran F C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fvelrn | |- ( ( Fun F /\ x e. dom F ) -> ( F ` x ) e. ran F ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( Fun F /\ ran F C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) /\ x e. dom F ) -> ( F ` x ) e. ran F ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ( ( Fun F /\ ran F C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) /\ x e. dom F ) -> ( F ` x ) e. ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_1st2ndb | |- ( ( F ` x ) e. ( _V X. _V ) <-> ( F ` x ) = <. ( 1st ` ( F ` x ) ) , ( 2nd ` ( F ` x ) ) >. ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( ( Fun F /\ ran F C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) /\ x e. dom F ) -> ( F ` x ) = <. ( 1st ` ( F ` x ) ) , ( 2nd ` ( F ` x ) ) >. ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fvco | |- ( ( Fun F /\ x e. dom F ) -> ( ( 1st o. F ) ` x ) = ( 1st ` ( F ` x ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fvco | |- ( ( Fun F /\ x e. dom F ) -> ( ( 2nd o. F ) ` x ) = ( 2nd ` ( F ` x ) ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_opeq12d | |- ( ( Fun F /\ x e. dom F ) -> <. ( ( 1st o. F ) ` x ) , ( ( 2nd o. F ) ` x ) >. = <. ( 1st ` ( F ` x ) ) , ( 2nd ` ( F ` x ) ) >. ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( Fun F /\ ran F C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) /\ x e. dom F ) -> <. ( ( 1st o. F ) ` x ) , ( ( 2nd o. F ) ` x ) >. = <. ( 1st ` ( F ` x ) ) , ( 2nd ` ( F ` x ) ) >. ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( ( Fun F /\ ran F C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) /\ x e. dom F ) -> ( F ` x ) = <. ( ( 1st o. F ) ` x ) , ( ( 2nd o. F ) ` x ) >. ) |
